abouttext: MBM Logistics LLC, established in 2016, specializes in logistics and supply chain management with a special focus on international trade with all countries. Our dedicated team is service oriented. We have endless options to provide 24/7 boutique-level support, keeping our customers updated on progress and every hard-won milestone. We maintain close relationships with our clients to ensure that their supply chain solutions are managed seamlessly.
abouttext1: Welcome to the "About Us" page of MBM Logistics! We are a leading company in the field of logistics and have been operating since 2016. During this time, we have successfully implemented more than 100 projects per year and served more than 300 satisfied customers. We specialize in the provision of cargo transportation services, both internationally and nationally. Our company provides access to more than 100 countries, which allows our customers to easily and conveniently organize the delivery of their goods to any corner of the world. Our company employs more than 30 specialists who are ready to provide customers with high-quality service. We strive to ensure that each client receives an individual approach and a solution to all their needs in the field of logistics.
abouttext2: We are also proud to provide our customers with innovative IT solutions that allow you to receive updates on the status and location of cargo through a telegram bot. This is a convenient and fast way to get information about the status of the cargo. We are located in Uzbekistan and cooperate with clients from various industries, including manufacturing, trade and logistics. Our company always strives for high-quality and timely delivery of goods to our customers so that they can be confident in their success in the market. We thank you for choosing our company and we are ready to provide you with high quality logistics services. Our goal is to provide you with maximum comfort and confidence that your cargo will be delivered on time!

newstext2: Reliability: The Logistics company provides you with reliable and safe logistics services Guarantees: The company's liability is insured. We are confident in our strengths and capabilities, but nevertheless we insure liability to ensure 100% security for the client. Experience: Each transport company, entering the market, in the first years develops contacts, establishes profitable partnerships and increases the professionalism of employees. By overcoming difficult situations, the organization gains experience. You cannot feel it with your hands, but the precise fulfillment of the tasks you set depends on the presence of experience. The MBM Logistics company has trained personnel and proven partners, understands the specifics of its industry, and therefore guarantees the delivery of your goods on time. Employees: Entrusting the execution of an order to a team of professionals means guaranteeing an excellent result. Competent specialists, extensive experience and love for their work will promptly solve your problem.
